scripts.reset: npm run _install && npm run bootstrap && npm run _unlink
scripts.release:patch: npm run verify-git-not-dirty && npm run build && lerna version patch --yes && lerna run build:unpkg:dist --no-private && lerna publish from-package --yes
scripts.release:minor: npm run verify-git-not-dirty && npm run build && lerna version minor --yes && lerna run build:unpkg:dist --no-private && lerna publish from-package --yes
scripts.release:prerelease:dev: npm run build && lerna version prerelease --yes && lerna run build:unpkg:dist --no-private && lerna publish from-package --dist-tag dev --yes
